nodes.text: Akuria was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, not far from the planet Dantooine, that was a suspected base of rebel operations. Akuria and several other locations were identified in a 3 ABY Imperial Security Bureau report that generated targets for Viper probe droid surveys by cross-referencing areas with a high degree of suspicious activity with the unsettled parts of the galaxy favored by the rebels.
